speaker: LORENZO
text_entry: SCENE V. The same. Before SHYLOCK'S house.

speaker: LORENZO
text_entry: Enter SHYLOCK and LAUNCELOT

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Well, thou shalt see, thy eyes shall be thy judge,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: The difference of old Shylock and Bassanio:--

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: What, Jessica!--thou shalt not gormandise,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: As thou hast done with me:--What, Jessica!--

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: And sleep and snore, and rend apparel out;--

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Why, Jessica, I say!

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: Why, Jessica!

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Who bids thee call? I do not bid thee call.

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: Your worship was wont to tell me that

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: I could do nothing without bidding.

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: Enter Jessica

speaker: JESSICA
text_entry: Call you? what is your will?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: I am bid forth to supper, Jessica:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: There are my keys. But wherefore should I go?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: I am not bid for love; they flatter me:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: But yet I'll go in hate, to feed upon

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: The prodigal Christian. Jessica, my girl,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Look to my house. I am right loath to go:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: There is some ill a-brewing towards my rest,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: For I did dream of money-bags to-night.

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: I beseech you, sir, go: my young master doth expect

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: your reproach.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: So do I his.

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: An they have conspired together, I will not say you

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: shall see a masque; but if you do, then it was not

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: for nothing that my nose fell a-bleeding on

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: Black-Monday last at six o'clock i' the morning,

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: falling out that year on Ash-Wednesday was four

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: year, in the afternoon.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: What, are there masques? Hear you me, Jessica:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Lock up my doors; and when you hear the drum

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: And the vile squealing of the wry-neck'd fife,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Clamber not you up to the casements then,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Nor thrust your head into the public street

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: To gaze on Christian fools with varnish'd faces,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: But stop my house's ears, I mean my casements:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Let not the sound of shallow foppery enter

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: My sober house. By Jacob's staff, I swear,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: I have no mind of feasting forth to-night:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: But I will go. Go you before me, sirrah;

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Say I will come.

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: I will go before, sir. Mistress, look out at

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: window, for all this, There will come a Christian

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: boy, will be worth a Jewess' eye.

speaker: LAUNCELOT
text_entry: Exit

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: What says that fool of Hagar's offspring, ha?

speaker: JESSICA
text_entry: His words were 'Farewell mistress;' nothing else.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: The patch is kind enough, but a huge feeder;

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Snail-slow in profit, and he sleeps by day

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: More than the wild-cat: drones hive not with me;

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Therefore I part with him, and part with him

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: To one that would have him help to waste

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: His borrow'd purse. Well, Jessica, go in;

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Perhaps I will return immediately:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Do as I bid you; shut doors after you:

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Fast bind, fast find;

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: A proverb never stale in thrifty mind.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text_entry: Exit

speaker: JESSICA
text_entry: Farewell; and if my fortune be not crost,

speaker: JESSICA
text_entry: I have a father, you a daughter, lost.

speaker: JESSICA
text_entry: Exit
